title: Uladzimir Zhuravel
text:
Uladzimir Ivanavich Zhuravel (; ; 9 June 1971 – 18 November 2018) was a <a href="Belarus">Belarus</a>ian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player and coach. In 2018 he was the head coach of <a href="FC%20Shakhter%20Karagandy">Shakhter Karagandy</a>. He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Top%20League">Soviet Top League</a> in 1990 for <a href="FC%20Dinamo%20Minsk">FC Dinamo Minsk</a>.
Honours.
Dinamo Minsk 
Death.
Zhuravel died on 19 November 2018 after a struggle with an illness.
